Description: Cerby provides comprehensive access management for applications that don't work with identity providers.
Full Description: Cerby provides identity teams with the only comprehensive access management platform for nonstandard applications. Harnessing the power of identity providers, Cerby removes the need for manual tools and compensating controls (like enterprise password managers) by automating everyday human security tasks based on single sign-on and lifecycle management cues from upstream identity providers. This allows Cerby to protect any application independent of standards support. Cerby's patent-pending access orchestration engine is the first and only one to make passwordless authentication an immediate reality for nonstandard applications. Cerby saves time and money by automating manual tasks, like offboarding and 2FA enrollment, and providing IAM professionals with deep visibility and control of employee-onboarded applications. With Cerby, identity teams can extend access, minimize risk, and lower costs.

Description: MoneyGeek provides consumers with advice & tools to help choose the best financial options, such as insurance, credit cards, loans & more.
Full Description: We're personal finance geeks with decades of combined experience in writing and publishing information about how individuals should manage money and credit. What drives us is the conviction that consumers can make smart money decisions but don't have the time to become a mini-expert in finance. So many sites publish generic information that skims the surface of a financial topic. We think there's a better way. When you're trying to decide if it's a good time to refinance your home loan or whether to pay down your student loans or credit cards first, what you really want is to make a sound decision, fast — and feel confident that it was the right choice. Here's what we offer: Explanations on money topics that go deep enough but don't feel like reading a dry textbook. Step-by-step instructions and checklists. Calculators that actually tell you what's going on with the numbers in plain English. Questions answered by industry experts. We want you to quickly figure out what's best for your financial life, without muss or stress.

Description: Tribe Capital is a venture capital firm that focuses on capturing a perpetual edge in venture and crypto using data science.
Full Description: Tribe Capital is a top-quartile venture capital firm focused on capturing a perpetual edge in venture and crypto using data science. The team is made up of investors, engineers and scientists who use artificial intelligence (“AI”) and data science to model venture-backed private companies. Beyond investment capital, Tribe deploys these AI tools to separate signal from noise, helping our companies understand their businesses better.  Our data-informed strategy includes an underwriting infrastructure and a quantitative analysis tool called the “Magic 8-ball.” We leverage these tools to provide deep insight on factors driving growth and how to accelerate sustainable growth, honed through years of developing similar products at major tech and finance players like Lyft, Yahoo, Facebook, and Bridgewater Associates.   Our team uses these tools to measure quantitative product-market fit, so we can more effectively assess and accelerate what Tribe refers to as “N-of-1” companies - companies with the potential to be 10-100x growth opportunities, while minimizing loss ratio by a large degree.  Tribe Capital has $1.6 billion in assets under management and has made notable investments in Apollo.io, Carta, Docker, Kraken, Instabase, Relativity Space, and Shiprocket.

Description: Timeshifter is the world’s most advanced circadian analytics and solutions platform.
Full Description: Timeshifter is the world’s most advanced circadian analytics and solutions platform designed to unlock unrealized human performance and improve our health and safety. Working directly with the world’s leading scientists, clinicians, and institutions, Timeshifter is translating circadian science into accessible technology solutions. In 2018, Timeshifter launched its first product — now the most-downloaded and highest-rated jet lag app in the world. Based on more than 80,000 post-flight surveys, travelers who followed Timeshifter's advice versus travelers who didn’t follow their Timeshifter plan were 16 times less likely to report very severe jet lag. Recently, Timeshifter launched a new app to help shift workers optimize their sleep, alertness, health, and quality of life. At least 20% of the global labor force are shift workers, changing to a new schedule soon after they adapted to the previous one, or never adapting at all. Timeshifter has received several awards and recognition, including the National Sleep Foundation's SleepTech® Award, Health Magazine's Sleep Award, and an honorable mention of Fast Company's World Changing Ideas. Partners include United Airlines, SAP, CTW, Amadeus, Six Senses, Tripadvisor, TravelPerk, Montblanc, and Haven Life. Investors include former NASA Astronauts Michael López-Alegría and Mike Massimino, Chief Medical Officer for Axiom Space, Dr. Smith Johnston, Chairman of Air Canada, Vagn Sørensen, legendary race driver with 9 Le Mans wins, Tom Kristensen, and entrepreneur and endurance GT car racer, John Shoffner.

Description: All-in-One Cyber Governance SaaS Platform
Full Description: Avertro is a venture-backed global cybersecurity software company. We believe that everyone should be empowered to understand their cyber-why, so they can make informed choices about their cyber safety. That’s why we’ve created products that translate security in a normalised way, bringing science to cyber storytelling. One of the key challenges facing leaders is the disconnect between the cyber team and everyone else, particularly with the executive layer. Leadership teams continue to struggle to understand if they are cyber resilient. In attempting to provide answers, security teams use a range of disparate, disconnected, expensive tools, spreadsheets, and unsustainable manual methods. We have built CyberHQ®, a first-to-market All-in-One Cyber Governance SaaS platform to help our customers govern, manage, measure, and report on their cybersecurity function. Our product automates, streamlines, and bridges the gap between the technical and business aspects of cyber by codifying the relationships between data points and producing the right metrics to make defensible, data-driven decisions. We help leaders elevate their game by explaining cybersecurity to executives, forecasting outcomes, right-sizing spend, and validating their strategy so they can optimise the use of external assistance and prove they are doing cyber right.

Full Description: 911inform is the only emergency management and communication platform that assists communication and control between local authorities and your organization. From notifying emergency personnel about the exact who, what, where, and when of any crisis, to providing responders and on-site personnel temporary command and control of the situation, 911inform is the definitive partner in any emergency. 911inform is a browser-based, single-pane-of-glass emergency management and bi-directional communication solution that saves valuable time in emergencies and connects your organization's user group directly to first responders. As an expansion to 911 services, we provide emergency location identification, route planning, communication tools, and resource coordination to create complete situational awareness and pave the way for reliable safety in any setting. Our solution allows first responders and on-site teams the tools necessary to mitigate emergencies faster and more effectively. With over 200 integrations and counting, 911inform can overlay seamlessly into any organization and any setting, providing K-12 education, postsecondary education, office buildings, municipalities, retail, hospitals, arenas, concert venues, and more with the tools and control they need for situational awareness in any emergency. 911inform’s solutions upgrade your organization to be compliant with new federal legislation, including Kari’s Law, RAY BAUM’S Act, and Alyssa’s Law, ensuring access and information between emergency callers and emergency personnel.  911inform keeps your data protected. From emergency operation plans to passwords, we don’t steal, sell, or otherwise use your data. 911inform utilizes top-of-the-line security from hackers and data breaches as an added step in keeping you and your organization safe.

Description: Athliance is an NCAA and Sports Management Software Solution built by Compliance and Administration Experts.
Full Description: Athliance is a trailblazer in the realm of college athletics, specializing in providing technological solutions for Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) compliance. Founded in 2020, Athliance emerged in response to the monumental shift in college sports following the introduction of NIL rights. With a deep understanding of the evolving landscape, Athliance is dedicated to empowering universities, student-athletes, and stakeholders, ensuring they seamlessly navigate the complexities of NIL legislation. What We Do: At Athliance, our primary offering is PointGuard, a comprehensive NIL management platform. PointGuard acts as a strategic orchestrator in the NIL domain, facilitating transparent communication, real-time updates, and streamlined deal management. Designed for a variety of users including athletes, schools, brokers, sponsors, and deal payers, PointGuard revolutionizes how stakeholders interact and engage with NIL opportunities. Key Features: Automated Compliance: Streamlines the process of complying with NCAA regulations and state laws. Real-Time Deal Tracking: Monitors NIL deals as they happen, providing up-to-date information. Educational Resources: Offers tools and content to educate athletes and institutions on NIL rights and responsibilities. Data-Driven Insights: Delivers analytics and insights to help stakeholders make informed decisions. Our Mission: Athliance is committed to fostering collaboration, compliance, and transparency in collegiate sports. Our mission is to provide solutions that not only address current NIL challenges but also anticipate future industry shifts. We aim to facilitate the sustainability and prosperity of college athletics, ensuring all parties involved navigate the NIL landscape with confidence and integrity. Future Outlook: As discussions around Revenue Sharing and the transformation of collegiate sports continue to gain momentum, Athliance remains at the forefront of innovation. We are constantly evolving our solutions to adapt to and cater to these emerging trends, ensuring our platform aligns with the shifting landscape of college athletics.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Education, Information Technology, Software, Sports
Founders: Dimitri Constantine, Peter Schoenthal, Sean Hughes

Today, esports discussion and communities are fragmented across Twitter, Reddit, Discord, and Twitch chat - and esports culture has long been mired by the toxicity that comes with anonymity on the internet. Full Description: Kalshi is a federally regulated financial exchange that allows investors to trade directly on the anticipated outcome of future events. Because Kalshi’s market topics can be more specific than other instruments like stocks or bonds, investors can get direct exposure to the events and trends that they are interested in. For example, a Kalshi market on whether a certain free trade agreement will be signed can help retail investors get exposure to emerging markets and fluctuations in international trade. Description: Ezyhire: Integrates with ATS for tech screening, real-time open-to-work status updates, connects with engineers now hiring for their teams.
Full Description: Welcome to ezyhire, your trusted digital HR partner. Since our inception in 2019 by Ronel Maheshwari, we have been at the forefront of tech hiring, reshaping IT recruitment and HR operations. Our foundation is rooted in a profound understanding of software engineering, augmented by Maheshwari's HR expertise. Designed by engineers for engineers, ezyhire caters specifically to the needs of IT startups looking to hire remote software engineers, even without a local entity. Ezyhire stands out with its AI-powered technical assessment tool, revolutionizing candidate screening globally. This unbiased, efficient system automates evaluations, ensuring optimal matches for your needs while saving time and resources. We also integrate seamlessly with ATS platforms for tech screening, provide real-time updates on candidates' open-to-work status, and connect with engineers who are currently hiring for their teams. This integration enhances our ability to source the right talent efficiently. Our interview service offers a thorough assessment for each candidate. Conducted by seasoned professionals, this process ensures a detailed evaluation of each potential hire. Once you find the ideal candidate, ezyhire simplifies onboarding and team management. We make international hiring easy, ensuring compliance with local laws. As your Employer of Record (EOR), we manage HR, benefits, payroll, and tax compliance for your remote workers, allowing you to concentrate on your business growth. Ezyhire is more than a service; it's a relationship builder, a knowledge sharer, and a provider of swift, confident solutions for various employment needs. Our platform offers a competitive edge in the global tech talent market. With a presence in over 90 countries, ezyhire is creating a global tech talent community, bringing the best to your doorstep. Join us at ezyhire, where we make tech hiring simple, efficient, and globally accessible.

Traditional hosting has not evolved to embrace the latest technology, and design agencies struggle to find scalable, high performance hosting. Cloud infrastructures are costly, complex and out of reach for most agencies. To solve these problems we had to rethink hosting from the ground up, leveraging the latest technology, infrastructure, and development methods. The result is a multi-tiered system architecture that removes all of the single points of failure associated WordPress and scales as needed at each layer of the system.  Websites on Convesio outperform traditional hosting providers, reducing the amount of client complaints. We simplify complex hosting processes, providing a high availability, secure and scalable platform for client websites and streamlined workflows for agencies. Lastly, we enable agencies to differentiate hosting and use it as a true selling point while maximizing hosting profits.

Description: Kinspire focuses on supporting the developmental needs of children and their families through pediatric occupational therapy.
Full Description: Kinspire is a pediatric support platform that provides occupational therapy through telehealth to best support the developmental needs of children and their families.  Kinspire offers children and their families occupational therapy in the most flexible and convenient way- via asynchronous telehealth.  Kinspire therapists work with families to develop a collaborative Family Action Plan appropriate for their child.  Then, through a series of asynchronous instructional sessions, our therapists help train parents to be at the center of the therapeutic process.  Our asynchronous approach allows for parents to structure therapy at a time and in a way that works for their schedule, and it allows parents to reach out to our therapists with questions at any time, not just at a weekly or biweekly session. Kinspire was established in April, 2020 in Denver, Colorado.

Description: The first NFT marketplace in MENA
Full Description: For one thing, NFTs give you the ability to sell work there was no market or demand for previously. Also, NFTs make it possible for you to receive a percentage every time your work is sold or changes hands, so you are guaranteed a percentage of the profit if the work gains popularity and increases in price, not to mention, it’s just cool! NIFTY Souq is committed to ZERO minting costs for all artists launching NFTs on the platform, in addition to dedicated onboarding support to bring your NFT vision to life. With ZERO minting costs, artists can price their NFTs affordably, granting them access to more fans. Who we are At NIFTY Souq, we’re excited to be bringing a brand-new type of digital goods to the MENA region through Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). NFTs are unique digital files, which are provably scarce and useable across multiple applications. Like physical goods, you can do whatever you want with them! You can collect them, gift them, sell them, and even destroy them! They are digital files that are armed with all the programmable securities to allow them to become digital assets. A core part of our vision is to bring NFT and its technology to the MENA region to where users truly own this powerful brand of new digital items. Open, liquid marketplaces will help power these new economies and support artists to monetize through NFTs and digital assets. Therefore, we are working with a community of passionate users, developers, and creators to build the MENA’s first marketplace for NFTs. We are proud to be the first and largest marketplace for user-owned digital goods, including songs, music, illustrations, gifs, poetry, and many more assets backed by a blockchain.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Commerce and Shopping, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Software

Description: WorkChew is a startup that connects remote workers with restaurants and hotels that need to make use of their space.
Full Description: WorkChew is a marketplace that connects remote workers to the safe, productive coworking space in worker-friendly restaurants. It is focused on the B2B side of the business, signing up enterprises looking for flexible work options for their remote employees. The company also has a self-serve option, where remote workers can sign in, see the space options and all the amenities offered near their locations, and book a seat for up to four hours. For hotels on the WorkChew platform, users can also book a conference room or guest room. Restaurants and hotels on the WorkChew platform keep 100 percent of any money they make on food or beverage sales. With hotels, WorkChew makes a commission off conference room bookings, but the hotels keep everything they make off everything else. Co-founders Maisha Burt and Allyson McDougal established the company in Washington, District of Columbia in 2018.

Description: FabuLingua is a language learning platform based on comprehensible input that empowers educators to teach kids through stories and games.
Full Description: FabuLingua is an advanced language learning platform that empowers teachers and instructors to be more effective teaching kids based on the break-thru language acquisition science known as "comprehensible input" ("CI").  Our patented innovation is that we teach through interactive stories and games in the target language and weave in a translation to make it comprehensible. This leads to faster, more efficient language learning and longer-term retention. Language teachers understand the science of CI and crave content based on it.  And yet they are stuck with stale, 40yr old content and curriculum based on memorization and grammar rules.    We don’t sell directly to schools. Teachers get our platform for free and champion FabuLingua with their students/families. We earn revenue as families or schools convert to premium subscriptions for unlimited access at home. Teachers are highly credible product ambassadors that keep CAC low and promote retention.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain, E-Signature, FinTech, Legal Tech
Description: Sign, send and store your files for free
Full Description: At KwikTrust we've built two unusual products. The first is KwikSign - a digital signature app, which doesn't sound particularly innovative but we've approached the problem from a different angle. Our vision of the future is that people won't want to just sign contracts. There are new problems to be solved. They will need to sign any asset to either prove that they own it, approve it, agree with it, or want to protect it. This could be any asset type - contracts, video, audio, designs, drawings, deeds, code and more. In an age of artificial intelligence and fake information it's more important than ever to validate the authenticity of any asset. We achieve this by enabling any file type to be checked, validated, signed and recorded on a blockchain thereby creating a tamperproof record. Everything that is created can be linked to the validated identity of the validators to prove it is true and original. What are the use cases for this? There are many - creating deeds of ownership, issuing stock or share certificates, carrying out due diligence, recording intellectual property, confirming that a video, photo or audio file is the true and original version, in fact creating a tamperproof record of any event or asset. Our second product, launching next month, takes this one step further. Once an asset is created it needs to be transferable, tradable and traceable. To solve this problem we have built a SuperNFT which is an asset linked to the validated identities of the creators or legal owners. Because the SuperNFT 'knows' who its owners are it is also a mechanism for collecting and disbursing monies to the rightful beneficiaries, and it does this Super-quickly. Our first foray is in the world of music to enable artists to create new experiences for their audiences and to enable artists to be paid more quickly and more accurately.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Information Technology, Other, Privacy and Security, Professional Services, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Artur Pszczolkowski, Delia Sabau, Hassam Khawaja, Nick Spiller, Nick Spiller, Simon Read, Yasir Qayam

Full Description: 360MAX – a global network of VR cinema theatres.  The product for customers is a new leisure and entertainment based on VR technologies. 360MAX, being a VR cinema theatre, provides an immersive VR experience of watching the latest panoramic movies of different genres lasting up to 20 minutes in specially equipped spaces, starting from 70 sq.m. up to 150 sq.m. in cities with a population of 200.000+. Our customers are city dwellers 5-55yo that are keen to spend 10% of their income on entertainment. Our guests can visit our VR cinema theatres or order a VR entertainment media system for home. The 360MAX platform allows to scale fast and control our client experience in every location. It has a simple user interface that allows our guests to avoid difficult interactions with VR headsets with no need to use controllers or wired connections. The platform allows to launch 360-movie remotely and simultaneously so guests can watch one movie together or different movies at the same time. The 360MAX platform also allows copyright holders to earn money by distributing VR content in the 360MAX network on a revenue share model.  Our business model is based on private capital and franchises management, which allows us to open new 360MAX cinema theatres and attract more guests. 360MAX VR cinema theatres are cashflow positive starting from the 1st month with confirmed demand on the US market. Description: Āut is a suite of DAO-native Tools to expand decentralized communities.
Full Description: Āut is an extendable Protocol designed to power the next generation of human Coordination. The DAOs 2.0, if you like, or a DAO Renaissance. It does so by "expanding" any Standard DAO Contract - with custom Membership modules on top. Āut is a protocol that expands any DAO’s legacy contract (i.e.: a Moloch DAO), and bringing expandable, customizable membership & governance modules at contract level for Web3 Communities. At its core, it adds the native concept of Role & Interaction at contract level - so that each Member of a Community is represented in a much more multidimensional, richer way - other than a flat 0x… address. Currently, the Āut suite includes: - to Integrate āut, add Roles & expand/deploy a DAO from scratch. - a Decentralized Authentication System for DAOs. - a DAO OS, to manage members, tasks and community modules. - (my) ĀutID: a public profile & portfolio for self-sovereign, non-transferable NFT IDs.

Industries: Blockchain, Finance, FinTech, Information Technology, Internet, Software
Description: Sifchain is the world's first omni-chain decentralized exchange (DEX) for digital assets.
Full Description: Sifchain is the world's first omni-chain decentralized exchange (DEX) for digital assets, unlocking liquidity in various chains to free people from egregious fees and inefficient trades.  To bring this intention to reality, we envision extensive cross-compatibility with DEXs and centralized exchanges (CEX). The future of Sifchain is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) and, for DAOs to self-sustain, they need access to massive capital. We believe that building cross-chain liquidity will be fundamental to the future of the blockchain industry: an expectation, not a feature. Sifchain is built on the Cosmos Software Development Kit (SDK). Therefore, it is compatible with other Cosmos Network blockchains like Kava, Akash, and Terra via the Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) protocol.  As such, it is 100 times more efficient than Ethereum-based DEXs like Uniswap in terms of both trading fees and transaction speed. As a decentralized exchange, Sifchain combines the best elements of liquidity pools and order books for optimal order execution.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Information Technology, Internet Services, Other, Software

Description: Intain is building Intelligent Blockchains for transparency and efficiency in capital markets, starting with structured finance.
Full Description: Intain is building Intelligent Blockchains for transparency and efficiency in capital markets, starting with structured finance. Asset-backed investment volumes (including mortgage-backed securities and other financings) have touched pre-crisis levels, but the only major change since the financial crisis is an increased compliance burden, with little in terms of transparency or improved efficiency. Between the issuance and ongoing management of these investments, anywhere between four to eight intermediaries get involved with annual costs in excess of $30B across Securitization and other financing.   Intain gets lenders, issuers, investors and other parties like servicers, trustees and rating agencies on a shared-data platform for these transactions that uses artificial intelligence and certain features of blockchain for: -  seamless flow of data with zero reconciliation - complete transparency with provenance of asset and data  Intain is extending this to receivables financing, ESG bonds and development finance. Next step is to add trust and transparency to digital assets by bringing their "NAV" on blockchain.  Committed to diversity in fintech, half of Intain's employees are women. All our employees work in an environment that blends a research lab and start-up and a research lab.

Description: Kfobix's mission is to make power grids and green energy production facilities sustainable.
Full Description: At Kfobix, our mission is to revolutionize the green energy landscape, making it more efficient and sustainable. In a world increasingly impacted by climate change, our mission is critical: to facilitate a seamless transition to renewable energy sources. We specialize in creating cutting-edge superhydrophobic coatings that prevent ice formation on electrical transmission lines and wind turbines. This not only enhances the reliability of green energy infrastructure but also ensures uninterrupted energy production and transmission. Our innovation extends to the solar energy sector, where we are pioneering anti-dirt coatings. These coatings are designed to maintain the cleanliness of solar panels, thereby maximizing their efficiency and output. Our products represent a leap forward in nanotechnology, offering practical solutions to some of the most pressing challenges in the renewable energy sector. At Kfobix, we are driven by the belief that the future of energy can be cleaner, more reliable, and utterly sustainable. Our journey is marked by relentless research and development, pushing the boundaries of what is possible. By joining forces with us, you become part of a movement that is not just preparing for a sustainable future but actively building it, today. Let’s empower the world together with cleaner, more efficient energy solutions.
